wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Craig Robinson (born 10 March 1966) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. He made 70 appearances in the Football League playing for Burnley, Bury and Carlisle United, and also played non-league football for Wycombe Wanderers and Aylesbury United.

response: Andrew or Andy Robinson may refer to:
* Andy Robinson (footballer, born 1966), English former footballer
* Andy Robinson (footballer, born 1979), British football player
* Andy Robinson (footballer, born 1992), English footballer with Southampton F.C.
* Andy Robinson (design manager), curator and art manager
* Andy Robinson (loyalist), Northern Ireland paramilitary leader
